DOC.brief_summary: This observational study aim explore bladder function follow temporary unilateral low loop cutaneous ureterostomy carry newborns suffer severe congenital hydro-ureteronephrosis
DOC.brief_title: Unilateral Cutaneous Ureterostomy - Long Term Follow
DOC.criteria: Living patient Bilateral function kidneys Unilateral ureteral cutaneous diversion Dead patient Single kidney High percutaneous ureteral diversion ( e.g : cutaneous pyelostomies , bilateral cutaneous urinary diversion )
